entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain near noon then to snow mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
